name: Flying for the Future
description: The Terran Empire is in possession of the Sword and intends to use it to shake the foundations of the Klingon-Cardassian Alliance! Take down the thief and recover the Sword!
rules:
-- In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Syrran, Tchar, Voq, Lt. Sahil, Cultural Figures, or crew with matching Battle Traits, will provide a bonus.
-- Using The Artifact, the U.S.S. Yeager, or the Hirogen Hunter will provide a bonus to hull.
-- Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Syrran, Tchar, Voq, Lt. Sahil or Cultural Figures

featured_crew.name: Tchar
featured_crew.flavor: male Skorr and the hereditary prince of his race in the 23rd century who stole his race's holy artifact.

action.name: A Noble Death to Win a Great Dream

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

ship.name: Hirogen Hunter Ship
ship.flavor: Small but heavily-armed, these vessels are equipped to allow for efficient hunting and processing of game.

ship.name: The Artifact
ship.flavor: This Borg vessel is severed from the Collective and hosted both research and rehabilitation for xBs. Now active, its queencell, Borg population, and repair systems are engaged.

ship.name: U.S.S. Yeager
ship.flavor: During the Dominion War this light cruiser was often used to protect Deep Space Nine.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

screens.text: "You Federation bleeding hearts! So obsessed with ridiculous dog and pony shows like your little cultural figure festival. I suppose I should thank you for leaving an opening for a stronger faction to swoop in and snap up this rare prize. The Klingons will surely fall in line."
"I find it laughable that you believe a sword alone, even the fabled Sword of Kahless, will convince the Klingons to do anything for you. The Empire will certainly rain fire and violence upon you."
"The Klingons will fall in line if it involves a figure from their beloved mythology. Then the Empire can avoid the Klingon-Cardassian thorn in its side."
"I want to believe his plan would never work, but regardless, we need to retrieve the Sword. I'm counting on you, Captain."

"You Federation bleeding hearts! So obsessed with ridiculous dog and pony shows like your little cultural figure festival. I suppose I should thank you for leaving an opening for a stronger faction to swoop in and snap up this rare prize. The Klingons will surely fall in line."
"I find it laughable that you believe a sword alone, even the fabled Sword of Kahless, will convince the Klingons to do anything for you. The Empire will certainly rain fire and violence upon you."
"The Klingons will fall in line if it involves a figure from their beloved mythology. Then the Empire can avoid the Klingon-Cardassian thorn in its side."
"I want to believe his plan would never work, but regardless, we need to retrieve the Sword. I'm counting on you, Captain."
"How dare you imply our people would kowtow so readily to a human weakling such as yourself! The Sword is our artifact, but our pride as a people is our heritage."
"If it's nothing more than an artifact, I guess you wouldn't care if I tossed it in a black hole?"
"Insolent nIHwI', if you so much as--"
"I believe your anger has proven his point. Do not worry. The Captain here will certainly recover the Sword."
"How dare you imply our people would kowtow so readily to a human weakling such as yourself! The Sword is our artifact, but our pride as a people is our heritage."
"If it's nothing more than an artifact, I guess you wouldn't care if I tossed it in a black hole?"
"Insolent nIHwI', if you so much as--"
"I believe your anger has proven his point. Do not worry. The Captain here will certainly recover the Sword."
